title: Rainbow Bridge National Monument: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets        Gadget the Trash Tracker dog always stays on board when the humans go visit Rainbow Bridge. NPS Photo/Trash Trackers   Â    Pets are not allowed on the docks at Rainbow Bridge or on the trail to the bridge. Make sure you leave water and shade for your dog on the boat while you go see Rainbow Bridge. You will be gone for over an hour.
